name: mr_pete
text: I am onto you Onstad. You look like you are setting up a funny porno angle, but you never come at a man straight like that. So when your joke tomorrow is not about gay porn, I will nod once, firmly, so you know I saw through your twist.

name: tekende
text: He will nod back curtly, in such a manner as a man might use, as though saying "well met, cowboy."

name: woodenteeth
text:
One of these men will be wearing a fez.

You decide.

name: catachresis
text: A comment left by catachresis was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ishuta, Connellingus, nutmeg, Darthemed)

name: centipede_damascus
text: Instead of being like most millionaires and donating money to charities and such, Ray donates to snack food companies.

name: red_dawn
text: Ray is a little stupid with his money.

name: farqussus
text: You forgot to mention that he is a cat that wears a thong and sunglasses.

name: tekende
text: Oh yeah? Well, maybe you and I should lose some weight!

name: letterswewrote
text: heh, most every time beef has to help ray financially he puts on that shirt and black tie.

name: sp1derbaby
text: Like he's going to a funeral.

name: zapatos
text: Like he is a professional accountant.

name: boredom_man
text: The bailout has been ratified, and I have a feeling professional accountants will be spending a lot more time at funerals.

name: zapatos
text: So... we're all winners today.  Except the dude in the casket.  Well he still wins I guess.

name: vulpes-aurum
text: A professional funeral accountant.

name: pie4me6
text: A sex funeral?

name: wae
text: "Oreos" clearly has a lotta walkin around to do.

name: fineoakstructure
text: What makes me laugh is that he wrote the check not to Nabisco or some parent company, but to the cookie.

name: turnabout
text: Nabisco keeps Oreo on a pretty short leash, so it was probably greatly appreciated.

name: landowmpg
text: Nabisco is owned by Phillip Morris is it not?  I'm too lazy to do the research.  I assume everything is owned by them.

name: stuart
text: Isn't this his "on the phone" jacket?

name: jonnay
text: This is strip embodies why I want to be Ray pretty well.  I mean I want to send random checks in support of things I like.  Stella would still be on the air, that's for sure.

name: wittyname
text:
Panel 2.

It is all about Panel 2.

name: mikebox
text: The text, yes, but also check out Beef's eyes when Ray tells him

name: songbirdspectre
text: That website in the rollover is hell of such as horrible. In all ways.

name: yingkaixing
text: I don't understand why you're the only person that's mentioned this. She's the lady that makes the pictures of animals that geeks have printed on black t-shirts? And she has like, 16 cats. I don't understand why we were referred to that.

name: yingkaixing
text: I DON'T UNDERSTAND

name: woodenteeth
text: It's the only evidence that Dr. Manflesh and Onstad are chummy.

name: heccibiggs
text:
This one's my favourite.

[IMGS OFF]

name: fineoakstructure
text: The tiger is all like "Hold still, there's a dragonfly on the side of your head...I'm just...gonna get a rolled up magazine...wait a sec...and...and EAT YOUR FACE "

name: tekende
text:
Oh man

That is mega nasty
That is dog shit

name: zapatos
text: I hear there is a large market for this type of art amongst fans of nascar and methylamphetamine.  Is this who Lisa Frank will be in the future?

name: beansdooma
text: holy shit... beef's eyes in panel 2

name: canusdivinus
text: Every time Beef looks down, you can see the despair on his face. Ray's finances are that messed up, that just looking at them is painful.

name: fatfatcat
text: I love ham

name: mangtastic
text:
Second panel makes this a five for me.

$10,000 made out to Oreos ?

Aren't they owned by Nabisco?

name: businesstime
text: Walkin' around money

name: thegoodwillgirl
text: Roast Beef is left handed. That is awesome, yet not surprising to me.
